attributes.additional_details:
Have the Government interseed and stop the profiteering my energy companies who use the British Public as a profit base to ensure reduced prices in their European bases.
Further restrict the ammount of profit that can be made to line the pockets of its directors and share holders.
cease the practice of price hikes during winter and cold spells when they know that the public will have to heat their properties.
Cap and regulate this legalised theft
